RevisionEvent.Note: THEMIS Ground Observatories: Delete obsolete www-spc.igpp.ucla.edu Information URL, Resource Header Description reformated, Replace spurious YKNF information present in the NRSQ description. Metadata submitted by L.F. Bargatze on 2022-02-14, reviewed by LFB

ResourceHeader.Description:
Kiana (KIAN) station is located in Kiana, Alaska, USA. KIAN is part of the UCLA GBO Network.

+--------------------------------------------+
| Station Characteristics | Value  | Units   |
|-------------------------|--------|---------|
| Magnetic Latitude       |  65.00 | degrees |
| Magnetic Longitude      | 251.50 | degrees |
| Magnetic Declination    |  16.79 | degrees |
| UT of Magnetic Midnight |  12:02 | HH:MM   |
+--------------------------------------------+

Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically: S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the GMAG data.

OperatingSpan.Note: Start Date taken as the start of the day, that ia 00:00:00 UT, for the first CDF data file under the https://spdf.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/data/themis/thg/l2/mag/ data tree.
